verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is a fountain filled with blood newline Drawn from Immanuel's veins; newline And sinners, plunged beneath that flood, newline Lose all their guilty stains: newline Lose all their guilty stains, newline Lose all their guilty stains; newline And sinners, plunged beneath that flood, newline Lose all their guilty stains.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The dying thief rejoiced to see newline That fountain in his day; newline And there may I, though vile as he, newline Wash all my sins away: newline Wash all my sins away, newline Wash all my sins away; newline And there may I, though vile as he, newline Wash all my sins away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Dear dying Lamb, Thy precious blood newline Shall never lose its power newline Till all the ransomed church of God newline Are saved, to sin no more: newline Are saved, to sin no more, newline Are saved, to sin no more; newline Till all the ransomed church of God newline Are saved, to sin no more.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: For since by faith I saw the stream newline Thy flowing wounds supply, newline Redeeming love has been my theme, newline And shall be till I die: newline And shall be till I die, newline And shall be till I die; newline Redeeming love has been my theme newline And shall be till I die.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: When this poor lisping, stamm'ring tongue newline Lies silent in the grave, newline Then in a nobler, sweeter song newline I'll sing Thy pow'r to save: newline Then in a nobler sweeter song newline I'll sing Thy pow'r to save; newline I'll sing Thy pow'r to save, newline I'll sing Thy pow'r to save; newline Then in a nobler sweeter song newline I'll sing Thy pow'r to save.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: E'er since by faith I saw the stream newline Thy flowing wounds supply, newline Redeeming love has been my theme, newline And shall be till I die: newline And shall be till I die, newline And shall be till I die; newline Redeeming love has been my theme, newline And shall be till I die.
